remarks: The value of the continuous complex function operation is the set of continuous functions from ` A ` to ` B ` .  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Oct-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Nov-2013.)
statement:
cncfval $p |- ( ( A C_ CC /\ B C_ CC ) -> ( A -cn-> B ) = { f e. ( B ^m A ) | A. x e. A A. y e. RR+ E. z e. RR+ A. w e. A ( ( abs ` ( x - w ) ) < z -> ( abs ` ( ( f ` x ) - ( f ` w ) ) ) < y ) } ) $.
$d A f w x y z $.
$d B f w x y z $.
$d f w x y z $.
$d w x y z $.
$d w y z $.
